m_szDocTitle: Massachusetts' Clean Energy Economy Grows 11.2%, Creates 71K+ Jobs - CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Massachusetts’ Clean Energy Economy Grows 11.2%, Creates 71K+ Jobs August 31st, 2012 by Andrew     Government investment and support for clean, renewable energy development is paying off handsomely in Massachusetts, where the clean energy economy grew 11.2% between July 2011 and July 2012. The state’s fast-growing clean energy sector now employs 71,523 people at 4,995 clean energy businesses across the state, according to a Massachusetts Clean Energy Center (MassCEC) report released Aug. 16. “I have said from the beginning of this Administration that, if we get
